Hey!

I build software and teach people about it.

I am currently the Lead Backend developer at Drivy, a startup creating the leading european peer to peer car rental website. Before that I worked both in France and the US for various startups, agencies or larger companies.

I spend the rest of my time giving classes (at HEC, HETIC, Learn Assembly, FACE and more), talking in meetups, contribute to open source or working on side projects such as Liff, a quantified self app to track your day in a relevant way.

You can reach me via @marcgg on Twitter, my LinkedIn account or my email "marcg.gauthier-at-gmail-dot-com". If you want to hire me, go check out this page before contacting me.

Marc-
